meanings.definition: Teased or styled by combing the hair towards the scalp to create volume.
meanings.sent1: She backcombed her hair to make it look fuller.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, I backcombed my hair for a special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The clown backcombed his wig to ridiculous heights, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her words backcombed my thoughts, adding depth to our conversation.
meanings.sent5: The wind backcombed the tall grass, creating a mesmerizing pattern.
